price: Wakaja wachawi kwa Firauni, wakasema: Hakika tutapata ujira ikiwa tutashinda.
arabic: وَجَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ
footnotes: Basi wakaja kwa Firauni wachawi walio kusanywa na askari wake. Nao wakasema: Hapana shaka nasi tutapata malipo makubwa yanayo lingana na hili linalo takikana kwetu, ikiwa sisi tutamshinda Musa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wajāa al-saḥaratu fir'ʿawna qālū inna lanā la-ajran in kunnā naḥnu al-ghālibīna
